shyam wrote:

>         1.how should i change the format of the report
> that the Junit generates.

Do you mean the Ant task <junitreport>?

There are XSL stylesheets that you can change. The <junitreport> task 
allows you to specify the stylesheet you want to use. Look at the Ant 
documentation or _JUnit Recipes_ (chapter 5) for details.
